entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
